( https://community.make.com/t/releases-on-make-january-2025/68487?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )New This Month: DeepSeek, GPT Chatbot, Harpa AI, and more

 

In Make, this month is marked by AI expansion. We bring popular apps like DeepSeek, GPT Chatbot, and Harpa AI. Not into AI? Explore Metricool for social media insights or new Make modules to work with incomplete executions. There's plenty to discover!

See what's new ➜ ( https://community.make.com/t/releases-on-make-january-2025/68487?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

 

( https://community.make.com/t/feature-spotlight-updated-notes/68593?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Release Spotlight: Updated scenario notes

 

Have you already tried our new notes? They now attach directly to modules, putting key information at your fingertips. Enhanced editing, rich text support, and an upgraded notes panel make managing notes much more efficient.

Upgrade your notes ➜ ( https://community.make.com/t/feature-spotlight-updated-notes/68593?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://www.make.com/en/blog/what-is-ai-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
Make Blog: Your AI automation guide for 2025

 

AI is powerful, but AI with automation? Next-level. Integrate ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini, and build workflows that do the heavy lifting. From generating reports to optimizing customer interactions, AI automation unlocks efficiency like never before!

Start with AI automation ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/blog/what-is-ai-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

 

Challenge Alert: The Master of Make is back!

 

After the previous winner Vincent impressed us with hisAI-powered product management assistant ( https://www.make.com/en/blog/master-of-make-interview?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io ), we’re eager to see what solutions you’ll bring to the table this round. Show us how your customer experience solutions can make an impact and become the next Master of Make!

Challenge accepted ➜ ( https://community.make.com/t/community-challenge-transforming-customer-experience-with-make-and-ai/70412?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://www.make.com/en/success-stories/sommo-make-powers-extra-leads?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Customer Story: Make brings 800 extra leads per month

 

Standing out in a crowded market? Sommo cracked the code with an AI-powered SRS generator built on Make. The payoff? Up to 800 extra leads per month, a 3% lead-to-client conversion rate, 5x more active users, and faster project timelines. Want to see their winning formula?

Read more ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/success-stories/sommo-make-powers-extra-leads?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

 

( https://www.make.com/en/webinars/ai-agent-workflow-and-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
Webinar: AI agent workflows and automation

Want to see AI automation in action? Our latest webinar dives into practical use cases, from streamlining contract management to enhancing e-commerce with AI-driven product descriptions, videos, and images. If you're looking for ways to scale your business, this is a must-watch.

Watch now ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/webinars/ai-agent-workflow-and-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://www.make.com/en/login?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
Top Tip: Retry incomplete executions with a single click

 

Did you know we've made handling incomplete executions easier? Bulk-select and retry them with a single click! Once retried, all executions are automatically scheduled and processed. Plus, for auto-retries, you'll now see exactly when they’re scheduled to rerun. We hope you'll love it!

Manage your executions ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/login?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+2%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
